title.narrative: Advisory support, research and evaluation for northern Uganda

description.narrative: This activity (Advisory support, research and evaluation for northern Uganda) is a component of Post-Conflict Development in Northern Uganda reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £1,371,383. This component benefits Uganda, and works in the following sector(s): Public sector policy and administrative management, Communications policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: Coffey International Development, London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine, Montrose, PwC, WYG International. The start date is 01-04-2010 and the end date is 31-12-2016.

participating-org.narrative: London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine
